tasks.label: ARC Sentinel Edge Lift
tasks.narrative: Detect latent pixel edges, amplify discovery, and route high-confidence transformations back into the shared skill graph.

perspectives.label: Deterministic replay
perspectives.method: Independent recomputation of pipeline metrics to detect hidden state drift.

perspectives.label: Baseline dominance
perspectives.method: Compare against deterministic seed pipeline from mission hints.

perspectives.label: Adversarial jitter
perspectives.method: Inject bounded noise into inputs and compare to baseline outputs for resilience.

perspectives.label: Constraint & peer safety
perspectives.method: Enforce allowlisted operations, thermodynamic alignment, and elite dominance checks.

attempts.notes: Consensus rejected misaligned agent – stake partially slashed and job requeued.
Meta-agentic evolved solver achieved consensus and claimed rewards.

details.description: Detect latent pixel edges, amplify discovery, and route high-confidence transformations back into the shared skill graph.
